snippet: In the final episode of Season 1, Frank Underwood’s ultimate goal, at least for this season, is revealed, but he has newsies on his tail who smell a rat and/or a big story.
abstract: In the final episode of Season 1, Frank Underwood’s ultimate goal, at least for this season, is revealed, but he has newsies on his tail who smell a rat and/or a big story.

byline.original: By DAVID CARR and ASHLEY PARKER

headline.main: 'House of Cards,' Episode 13 Recap: Journalism and Politics Finally Break Up
